I used this download: http://skype.com/go/getskype-linux-static
it's the "Static binary tar.bz2 with Qt 3.2 compiled in" version (since I use gnome and don't want to install the smelly Qt libraries centrally)
I,m downloading it now
how do I install it?
I installed it just for my user, like this:
cd; mkdir -p programs; cd programs; tar xf ~/Desktop/skype_static*.bz2; cd skype *; ./skype

in skype, do you see anything interesting in tools->options->headsets ?
